name: Guardian's Sword
description: Standard issue sword for Night Watchmen. Well-balanced and reliable.
note: Basic weapon for Guardian class characters

name: Scholar's Staff
description: A wooden staff used by academy scholars. Enhances magical abilities.
note: Basic weapon for Scholar class characters

name: Royal Ceremonial Blade
description: An ornate blade befitting imperial status. More symbolic than practical.
note: Basic weapon for Royal class characters

name: Strategist's War Fan
description: A metal war fan used by military commanders. Provides tactical advantages.
note: Basic weapon for Strategist class characters

name: Xu Qi'an's Investigation Blade
description: A specially modified sword that incorporates modern forensic tools. Unique to Xu Qi'an.
note: Unique weapon - enhances investigation abilities and attack power

name: Bronze Gong's Saber
description: Standard weapon for Bronze Gong rank Guardians. Sturdy and dependable.

name: Silver Gong's Blade
description: Enhanced weapon for Silver Gong rank Guardians. Forged with superior techniques.
note: High-tier Guardian weapon with attack bonus

name: Gold Gong's Sword
description: Elite weapon for Gold Gong rank Guardians. Imbued with spiritual energy.
note: Elite Guardian weapon with significant bonuses

name: Taoist Immortal Sword
description: A sword forged by Taoist masters. Channels spiritual qi for enhanced combat.
note: Taoist weapon - enhances magical abilities and qi techniques

name: Confucian Righteousness Sword
description: A blade blessed with Confucian moral power. Strikes true against evil.
note: Confucian weapon - bonus damage against evil enemies

name: Buddhist Vajra Staff
description: A staff wielded by Buddhist warrior monks. Channels dharma power.
note: Buddhist weapon - enhances defense and meditation abilities

name: Warlock's Enchanted Wand
description: A wand used by court warlocks for divination and magical manipulation.
note: Warlock weapon - significantly enhances magical abilities

name: Shaman's Ritual Dagger
description: A ceremonial dagger used in shamanic rituals. Channels spiritual forces.
note: Shaman weapon - enhances spiritual and magical abilities

name: Gu Master's Poison Blade
description: A blade coated with Gu poison. Deadly to those who underestimate it.
note: Gu Master weapon - has chance to inflict poison on hit

name: Wei Yuan's Strategic Fan
description: Lord Wei's personal war fan. A symbol of his tactical genius and authority.
note: Unique weapon - Wei Yuan's signature item with massive tactical bonuses

name: Princess Lin'an's Royal Scepter
description: A ceremonial scepter symbolizing imperial authority and divine mandate.
note: Unique weapon - Princess Lin'an's scepter with imperial command abilities

name: Demon Slayer Blade
description: A legendary sword specifically forged to combat supernatural entities.
note: Legendary weapon - massive bonus damage against demons and supernatural enemies

name: Sangbo Lake Relic Sword
description: A sword forged from materials found in Sangbo Lake. Contains mysterious power.
note: Legendary weapon - connected to the main story mystery

name: Immortal's Transcendent Blade
description: A weapon that has transcended mortal limitations. Only for those who have reached the highest cultivation.
note: Ultimate weapon - for transcendent grade cultivators only
